update `CBOE` set CBOE02 = #{cboe02,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBOE03 = #{cboe03,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOE04 = #{cboe04,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBOE05 = #{cboe05,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOE06 = #{cboe06,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOE07 = #{cboe07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBOE08 = #{cboe08,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBOE10 = #{cboe10,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBOE21 = #{cboe21,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBOE09 = #{cboe09,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Standardprice = #{standardprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, thisprice = #{thisprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where CBOE01 = #{cboe01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT a.CBOE07,a.CBOE08,b.CBCA08 ,c.nick_name as caua15,a.CBOE01,a.CBOE02,a.CBOE01 as id from CBOE a LEFT JOIN CBCA b on a.CBOE09=b.CBCA01 LEFT JOIN sys_user c on c.user_id=a.CBOE10 where a.CBOE06=0
and date_format(a.CBOE08,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.CBOE08,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
and a.CBOE08 >= #{startTime} and a.CBOE08 <=#{endTime}
and a.cboe07 = #{cboe07} and a.cboe01 = #{id} order by a.CBOE02 desc

SELECT a.CBOE07,a.CBOE08,c.CBCA08,d.nick_name as caua15,f.CALA08,e.CBPB12,e.CBPB08, b.CBOF09,b.CBOF13 FROM CBOE a left join CBOF b ON a.CBOE01=b.CBOE01 left join CBCA c ON c.CBCA01=a.CBOE09 LEFT JOIN sys_user d ON d.user_id=a.CBOE10 LEFT JOIN CBPB e ON e.CBPB01=b.CBOF08 LEFT JOIN CALA f ON f.CALA01=e.CBPB10 where a.CBOE01 = #{cboe01,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.CBOE07,a.CBOE08,c.CBCA08,d.CAUA15,f.CALA08,e.CBPB12,e.CBPB08, b.CBOF09,b.CBOF13 FROM CBOE a left join CBOF b ON a.CBOE01=b.CBOE01 left join CBCA c ON c.CBCA01=a.CBOE09 LEFT JOIN CAUA d ON d.CAUA01=a.CBOE10 LEFT JOIN CBPB e ON e.CBPB01=b.CBOF08 LEFT JOIN CALA f ON f.CALA01=e.CBPB10 where a.CBOE01 = #{orderId}
